survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with hybrid meeting tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you primarily use in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Consider adding an 'Other' option to capture tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a MULTI_CHOICE field type to allow selection of multiple tools.

script.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you primarily use in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the audio quality of your hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a SINGLE_CHOICE field type for this question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the audio quality of your hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video quality of your hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a SINGLE_CHOICE field type for this question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video quality of your hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?
answer_options: Lack of features (e.g., breakout rooms, polling)
questions.client_notes: Consider adding an 'Other' option to capture challenges not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a MULTI_CHOICE field type to allow selection of multiple challenges.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?
answer_options: Lack of features (e.g., breakout rooms, polling)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues during hybrid meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure the occurrence of technical issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a SINGLE_CHOICE field type for this question.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues during hybrid meetings?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an OPEN_TEXT field type for this question.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for hybrid meeting tools?
